alert.note: Alert for Broward; Collier; Mainland Monroe; Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 6:47PM EDT until September 19 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Collier County in southwestern Florida... Northern Mainland Monroe County in southwestern Florida... Northern Miami-Dade County in southeastern Florida... Southern Broward County in southeastern Florida... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 646 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles east of Dade-Collier Training Airport, or 23 miles west of Miramar, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Weston, Fortymile Bend, Dade-Collier Training Airport and Shark Valley Obs Tower. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
